title: A Vision-Language Pre-training Model-Guided Approach for Mitigating Backdoor Attacks in Federated Learning
summary: Defending backdoor attacks in Federated Learning (FL) under heterogeneous client data distributions encounters limitations balancing effectiveness and privacy-preserving, while most existing methods highly rely on the assumption of homogeneous client data distributions or the availability of a clean serve dataset.
